script.source:
import os
import sys
sys.path.append(os.getcwd())

# --- preprocessing
import json
try: a = json.loads(r'''{{inputs.parameters.a}}''')
except: a = r'''{{inputs.parameters.a}}'''
try: b = json.loads(r'''{{inputs.parameters.b}}''')
except: b = r'''{{inputs.parameters.b}}'''

from bettmensch_ai.pipelines.io import InputParameter

from bettmensch_ai.pipelines.io import OutputParameter
sum = OutputParameter("sum")

def add_parameters(a: InputParameter=1, b: InputParameter=2, sum: OutputParameter=None) -> None:
    """When decorated with the bettmensch_ai.components.component decorator,
    implements a simple addition bettmensch_ai.Component."""
    sum.assign(a + b)

add_parameters(a,b,sum)

import os
import sys
sys.path.append(os.getcwd())

# --- preprocessing
import json
try: a = json.loads(r'''{{inputs.parameters.a}}''')
except: a = r'''{{inputs.parameters.a}}'''
try: b = json.loads(r'''{{inputs.parameters.b}}''')
except: b = r'''{{inputs.parameters.b}}'''

from bettmensch_ai.pipelines.io import InputParameter

from bettmensch_ai.pipelines.io import OutputParameter
sum = OutputParameter("sum")

def add_parameters(a: InputParameter=1, b: InputParameter=2, sum: OutputParameter=None) -> None:
    """When decorated with the bettmensch_ai.components.component decorator,
    implements a simple addition bettmensch_ai.Component."""
    sum.assign(a + b)

add_parameters(a,b,sum)
